venue.name: The Alchemy Juice Bar & Growing Green Co-op

item.description:
Come and see Alchemy, and Hartford, in their first starring film role! The independent feature film Rising Star, shot in Hartford last October, will be having an audience test screening at Alchemy on May 25th.

Come and watch the work in progress, and talk with the film's writer/director, Marty Lang, and other crew members afterward. They will be asking for audience feedback on the movie, which they'll then use to improve the movie before its completion.

Organic Treats will be for sale & a suggested donation of $5 greatly appreciated for the evolution of the next phase of Alchemy!
item.why: Pre-release! Your feedback welcome for this Hartford grown film!
item.name: Rising Star Film Preview!
